<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Logging Account Status - GET</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/v1/cloudAccounts/awsLoggingAccounts/{loggingAccountId}/permissionsStatus"}></MethodEndpoint>



Get status of a logging account based on ID.
